message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $112.50, but I'm not going to go any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can sell it to you for $125, and that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $125. I'd be willing to meet you at $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
